participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and creative, always looking for new experiences and ways to express herself through photography.
participant_1.background: I got to take a lot of amazing photos of my favorite baseball player. I am adopted. I have never been married, but I've been with my partner for over ten years. I am highly educated. My sister is becoming my mother and often asks me when I am getting married.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Nurturing and family-oriented, enjoys cooking for others and values connections with loved ones.
participant_2.background: I would love to cook a big meatloaf to feed my family. I was adopted. I am not very good at playing basketball. I take care of my mother and father. I went to a community college and got a degree in communication.

content.text: Hi!
Hi!
I'm adopted too!
Me too! What are some fun things about it?
I love knowing I have a family that loves me unconditionally.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to know my biological parents.
I actually don't know much about my biological parents.
That's okay! I'm sure your adopted parents love you very much.
They do! They're the best!
That's great! I'm glad you have such a good family.
Thanks! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to cook and play basketball.
I like to take pictures and go on adventures.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love adventures!
Me too! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! Do you want to hang out sometime?
Sure! That would be great!
Great! What do you want to do?
We could go to a baseball game or something.
That sounds like fun! I love baseball!
Me too! We could go to the park and play basketball.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'd love to play basketball with you.
Great! We can hang out this weekend if you're free.
This weekend sounds great! I'm free all day Saturday.
Awesome! I'll text you my number so we can figure out the details.
Sounds good
